How can we be taken seriously if we ship our hazardous chemicals abroad, poisoning people and nature in the process in countries where safety regulations are weaker and less strictly enforced. - An export ban of toxic pesticides would be a boon for innovation and help Europe and the world move towards more sustainable plant protection methods. Keeping old and dangerous pesticides on the market is depriving us from a greener future and more sustainable farming practices. - A legal opinion by the Center for International Environmental Law published in 2022 shows that EU exports of banned pesticides to Africa and Central America violate the EUs international legal obligations and human rights law.

I think exporting to other countries hazardous or toxic chemicals that are forbidden in the EU is simply unacceptable and a symptom of a abysmal political hypocrisy. Is this the Europe we want? We often set examples for the world, but int his case we are as bad as the worst and we must change.

Bonjour, Il est déraisonnable d'utiliser des produits chimiques dangereux Il est déraisonnable de produire des produits chimiques dangereux Il est déraisonnable d'importer des produits chimiques dangereux Il est déraisonnable d'exporter des produits chimiques dangereux Enfin, il est déraisonnable d'accorder plus d'intérêt aux industriels qui raisonnent en profits qu'aux citoyens qui raisonnent intérêt général : ce n'est pas le projet européen Cordialement, Joe Muller
englishfeedback: HI, It is unreasonable to use hazardous chemicals It is unreasonable to produce hazardous chemicals It is unreasonable to import dangerous chemicals It is unreasonable to export hazardous chemicals. Finally, it is unreasonable to give more interest to profit-making industrialists than to citizens who think in the public interest: it’s not the European project Cordially, Joe Muller

feedback: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Wenn man schon diverse Gifte und sonstige toxischen Substanzen aufgrund der Gefährlichkeit innerhalb der EU verbietet, gebietet es eigentlich die simple Logik, dies für Länder außerhalb der EU ebenso zu machen, da die Gifte dort ja nicht plötzlich und ohne erkennbare Ursache ungiftig werden. Mit freundlichen Grüßen Alexander Winter
englishfeedback: Ladies and gentlemen, if various poisons and other toxic substances are already banned because of the danger within the EU, the simple logic is that this should be done in the same way for countries outside the EU, since poisons do not suddenly become intoxic in those countries without any apparent cause. Yours sincerely Alexander Winter

feedback: Il est intolérable et inacceptable dexporter des produits chimiques qui sont interdits dans lUE vers dautres pays, en Afrique en particulier. Cest une question déthique, de déontologie et de respect des populations concernées qui bien souvent nont aucune notion de la dangerosité de ces produits.
englishfeedback: It is intolerable and unacceptable to export chemicals that are banned in the EU to other countries, particularly in Africa. This is a dethical question of ethics and respect for the people concerned, who often have no idea of the dangerous nature of these products.

feedback: I wish to voice my opinion that the export of pesticides that are forbidden within the EU should be made illegal. This is partly due to double standards that Europeans should be kept safe from something we sell to other communities but mainly as part of a intricate and essential global environment it is suicidal to continue using poisons in our common biotopes, That big companies use fear tactics about employment at home is to be expected, there sole reason for existence is maximizing profits so I charge our elected representatives to take a stand for survival and against the markets fearmongering. This is written for the sake of us all but for my part also my children and grandchildren with their generation. Michael Bourne

L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici mette in luce un doppio standard: I pesticidi pericolosi sono stati vietati in Europa dopo essere stati collegati a cancro, problemi riproduttivi e malattie neurodegenerative, nonché alla morte delle api. Alcuni di questi pesticidi sono vietati in Europa perché collegati a danni cerebrali nei bambini e nei neonati. Se questi pesticidi sono troppo pericolosi per noi, come possiamo che vengano esportati allestero? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è una questione di diritti umani, poiché questi pesticidi tossici danneggiano le persone: Ogni anno, migliaia di agricoltori muoiono per l'esposizione di pesticidi pericolosi. Esistono innumerevoli studi che dimostrano gli effetti dannosi sulle persone dei pesticidi esportati. L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è dannosa per le api, la biodiversità e il pianeta. Le prove sono chiare: i neonicotinoidi e altri pesticidi velenosi uccidono le api. Ecco perché sono vietati in Europa. Perché continuiamo a permettere che vengano esportati in Paesi uccidendo le api e decimando la biodiversità? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici sfrutta i paesi con leggi più permissive. L'Europa ha un ruolo da svolgere nel mondo: non si deve permettere alle sue aziende di approfittare dei paesi con una regolamentazione più debole. Come possiamo essere presi sul serio se spediamo le nostre sostanze chimiche pericolose all'estero, avvelenando le persone e la natura in paesi dove le norme di sicurezza sono più deboli e meno rigorose? Un divieto di esportazione dei pesticidi tossici sarebbe un vantaggio per l'innovazione e aiuterebbe l'Europa e il mondo intero verso pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Mantenere sul mercato pesticidi vecchi e pericolosi ci priva di un futuro più verde e di pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Un parere legale del Centro di diritto ambientale internazional (Center for International Environmental Law), pubblicato nel 2022, dimostra che le esportazioni dell'UE di pesticidi vietati verso l'Africa e l'America centrale violano gli obblighi legali internazionali dell'UE e i diritti umani. Vietare urgentemente l'uso dei pesticidi in tutto il territorio della Unione è imperativo, i danni alla salute dei cittadini europei, all'ambiente. alla Biodiversità sono incalcolabili ed irreversibili..
englishfeedback: The export of toxic pesticides highlights a double standard: Hazardous pesticides have been banned in Europe after being linked to cancer, reproductive problems and neurodegenerative diseases, as well as to the death of bees. Some of these pesticides are banned in Europe because they are linked to brain damage in children and infants. If these pesticides are too dangerous for us, how can they be exported abroad? The export of toxic pesticides is a human rights issue, as these toxic pesticides harm people: Every year, thousands of farmers die from exposure of hazardous pesticides. There are countless studies demonstrating the harmful effects of exported pesticides on people. The export of toxic pesticides is detrimental to bees, biodiversity and the planet. The evidence is clear: neonicotinoids and other poisonous pesticides kill bees. This is why they are banned in Europe. Why do we continue to allow them to be exported to countries by killing bees and deciding on biodiversity? The export of toxic pesticides exploits countries with more permissive laws. Europe has a role to play in the world: its companies should not be allowed to take advantage of countries with weaker regulation. How can we be taken seriously if we ship our hazardous chemicals abroad, poisoning people and nature in countries where safety standards are weaker and lower? A ban on the export of toxic pesticides would benefit innovation and help Europe and the world towards more sustainable farming practices. Keeping old and hazardous pesticides on the market deprives us of a greener future and more sustainable farming practices. A legal opinion of the Center for International Environmental Law, published in 2022, shows that EU exports of banned pesticides to Africa and Central America violate the EU’s international legal obligations and human rights. An urgent ban on the use of pesticides throughout the EU is imperative, damage to European citizens’ health and the environment. Biodiversity is incalculable and irreversible.

feedback: Come cittadina europea sono fortemente contraria ad una legge he consenta ai produttori di sostanze chimiche, da noi bandite come pericolose, di esportare le stesse micidiali sostanze in altri paesi. Ritengo sia contrario ad ogni principio legale internazionale, umano e di semplicissimo buon senso. E' dimostrato che questi prodotti sono cancerogeni, distruggono la biodiversità (api in primis) e il nostro pianeta in generale: direi che di motivi per vietarli in tutto il mondo siano più che validi, ma che credibilità avremmo noi europei se usassimo due pesi e due misure? Moralmente mi sentirei profondamente tradita Laura Frittelli
englishfeedback: As a European citizen, I am strongly opposed to a law that allows producers of chemicals that we have banned as dangerous to export the same micidial substances to other countries. I believe it is contrary to any international, human and very common sense legal principle. There is evidence that these products are carcinogenic, destroy biodiversity (bees in the first place) and our planet in general: I would say that there are more than valid reasons for banning them worldwide, but what would be the credibility of us Europeans if we used double standards? I would feel deeply traversed Laura Frittelli

feedback: BASF und Bayer-Monsanto machen riesige Gewinne mit dem Export giftiger Pestizide nach Afrika und Südamerika. Damit gefährden sie das Leben der Menschen, die dort in der Landwirtschaft arbeiten und vergiften den Planeten. [1] In Europa sind diese Pestizide verboten. Warum? Weil sie zu gefährlich sind!!! Also Schluss mit dem Export nach Afrika und Südamerika.
englishfeedback: BASF and Bayer-Monsanto make huge profits from exporting toxic pesticides to Africa and South America. As a result, they threaten the lives of people working in agriculture and poisoning the planet. These pesticides are banned in Europe. Why? Because they are too dangerous! This means ending exports to Africa and South America.

feedback: Non si deve mandare ALTRO VELENO ai paesi poveri che abbiamo sempre sfruttato ! VIETATE L'ESPORTAZIONE DEI PESTICIDI!!!
englishfeedback: The poorer countries that we have always exploited should not be sent ALTRO poison! BAN THE EXPORT OF PESTICIDES!

feedback: Das Exportverbot für diese giftigen Chemikalien ist meiner Meinung nach alternativlos. Es ist nicht hinzunehmen, dass statt EU-Bürgern nun andere Menschen und Tiere vergiftet werden. Das verstößt gegen die Menschenrechte und tritt den Natur- und Artenschutz mit Füßen. Wir leben auf EINER Welt, wir wissen doch, dass sich alles Tun letzten Endes auch auf uns selbst auswirkt, denn alles hängt zusammen. Ich fordere Sie dringend und mit allem Nachdruck dazu auf, den Export komplett zu verbieten (und die Einhaltung des Verbots dann auch zu kontrollieren)! Danke für die Möglichkeit, meine Meinung zu äußern.
englishfeedback: In my view, the export ban on these toxic chemicals is not an alternative. It is unacceptable that other people and animals are now poisoned instead of EU citizens. This violates human rights and protects nature and species. We are living on a world, but we know that everything ultimately has an impact on ourselves, because everything is linked. I urge you to ban exports completely (and then to check compliance with the ban) as a matter of urgency! Thank you for the opportunity to express my opinion.

feedback: Perché avvelenare le altre nazioni quando è noto che queste sostanze sono altamente pericolose? Vi interessa solo il profitto? È un assassinio
englishfeedback: Why poisoning other nations when these substances are known to be highly dangerous? Are you interested in profit only? Is an assassination

feedback: Il est absolument urgent et indispensable darrêter la production et l'utilisation de ces poisons pour la diversité. De nombreux exemples d"exploitations sans ces produits dangereux montre un retour de la biodiversité. Insectes puis oiseaux nous sont indispensable, arrêtons de les massacrer!
englishfeedback: It is absolutely urgent and indispensable to stop the production and use of these poisons for diversity. Many examples of farms without these dangerous products show a return to biodiversity. Insects and birds are essential, let us stop massacking them!

feedback: Bienen und Insekten sind wichtig für die Bestäubung und für die Oekosysteme. Durch den viel zu hohen Einsatz von Pestiziden ist der Erhalt der Oekosysteme gefährdet, in Europa und weltweit. Gefährliche Pestizide haben nichts in unserer Umwelt verloren und sollten auch nicht exportiert werden.
englishfeedback: Bees and insects are important for pollination and for the oecosystems. The excessive use of pesticides threatens the preservation of the oecosystems, both in Europe and globally. Hazardous pesticides have not lost anything in our environment and should not be exported.

feedback: Je ne suis pas d'accord avec l'exportation de pesticides classés comme toxiques et interdits en europe vers des pays tiers. Si les risques sur la santé publique est avéré ou considéré comme tel dans l'UE il est immoral et incompréhensible que nous nous autirisions à les exporter, même si les pays tiers en font la demande. Au delà du risque sanitaire dans les pays concernés, il se pose aussi la question environnementale ?
englishfeedback: I disagree with the export of pesticides classified as toxic and banned in Europe to third countries. If risks to public health are known or considered to be public health risks in the EU, it is immoral and incomprehensible that we would afford to export them, even if third countries so request. In addition to the health risk in the countries concerned, the environmental question also arises?

feedback: Il est plus qu'anormal que l'exportation hors UE de produits chimiques interdits dans l'UE soit autorisé. J'irai même plus loin, c'est absolument immoral et scandaleux d'envoyer dans d'autres pays des poisons dont on ne veut pas soi-même. Il serait grand temps d'arrêter de prendre en compte et de privilégier les profits des grandes entreprises au détriment de la santé humaine et de la protection des milieux naturels dont nous avons plus que besoin pour survivre. Les profits de Bayer, Monsanto et consorts sont tellement élevés qu'il survivront sans problème à une interdiction d'exporter leurs produits les plus nocifs.
englishfeedback: It is more than abnormal that the export outside the EU of chemicals banned in the EU is authorised. I will go even further, it is absolutely immoral and scandalous to send poisons to other countries which we do not want to themselves. It would be high time to stop taking into account and prioritising the profits of large companies to the detriment of human health and the protection of the natural environment we need more than we need to survive. The profits of Bayer, Monsanto and Conorts are so high that it will easily survive a ban on exporting their most harmful products.

feedback: Gefährliche Chemikalien und Pestizide sind eines der maßgeblichen Gründe für das Artensterben für Tiere und Pflanzen, besonders für Insekten, nicht nur in Deutschland. Diese giftigen Substanzen gefährden auch die Gesundheit von zahllosen Menschen die damit in Berührung kommen, sei es bei der Feldarbeit oder bei der Herstellung. Sie verhindern auch eine ökologische Bewirtschaftung der Felder und tragen zu einer gravierenden Verarmung der Böden bei. Um dies zu verhindern dürfen keine schädlichen Chemikalien und Pestizide mehr benützt werden und vor allem nicht in die Umwelt gelangen, wo sie das Grundwasser und Oberflächenwasser vergiften. Deshalb bitte ich sie für ein Verbot von der Herstellung und Ausfuhr von gefährlichen Chemikalen zu stimmen.
englishfeedback: Hazardous chemicals and pesticides are one of the main causes of species extinction for animals and plants, especially insects, not only in Germany. These toxic substances also endanger the health of countless people who come into contact with them, whether during fieldwork or during manufacture. They also prevent the ecological management of the fields and contribute to the severe impoverishment of soils. In order to prevent this, harmful chemicals and pesticides should no longer be used and, above all, should not enter the environment where they are poisoning groundwater and surface water. I therefore ask you to vote in favour of a ban on the production and export of dangerous chemicals.

feedback: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren der EU-Kommission, ich denke, es ist höchste Zeit, die widersprüchliche Politik in Bezug auf gefährliche Chemikalien aufzugeben! Ich empfinde es als zutiefst verlogen, und bigott die eigene Bevölkerung zu schützen vor den Einflüssen solcher Chemikalien und die Bevölkerung viel ärmerer Länder, deren Gesundheitsversorgung auch bei schon entstandenen Schäden nicht helfen kann, den Gefahren des noch dazu meist ungeschützten Umgangs damit auszusetzen! Die EU muss endlich aufhören, "Zuhause" und in der Welt mit unterschiedlichen Maßstäben zu handeln und sich gleichzeitig auf der einen Seite die Einhaltung der Menschenrechte auf die Fahnen zu schreiben und deren Einhaltung woanders einzufordern und auf der anderen Seite des Profits wegen die Menschenrechte, insbesondere das auf Gesundheit, in derartiger Weise zu missachten! Dieses Bild der EU finde ich nicht vertretbar und schäme mich sehr dafür! Ändern sie diesen Zustand endlich, damit es nicht weiterhin Berichte gibt über furchtbare Auswirkungen UNSERER Chemikalien in anderen Teilen der Welt! Knicken Sie nicht immer ein vor der Drohung der Industrie in Bezug auf Arbeitsplätze hier! Die großen Konzerne werden andere, umwelt- und menschenfreundlichere Substanzen finden, wenn sie dazu gezwungen werden, überhaupt danach zu suchen. Und auch die hiesige Bevölkerung muss endlich verstehen, dass wir Verantwortung auch für den Rest der Welt tragen, mit der wir bisher derart schändlich umgegangen sind und dass dies auch Auswirkungen auf unseren eigenen Reichtum haben wird. Zeigen Sie Rückgrat! Wir verlassen uns auf SIE! Vielen Dank und mit freundlichen Grüßen, Charlotte Rist
englishfeedback: Ladies and gentlemen of the European Commission, I think it is high time to abandon the contradictory policy on hazardous chemicals! I find it deeply illegitimate and bigott to protect our own population from the influences of such chemicals and the population of much poorer countries, whose health care cannot help to expose themselves to the risks of handling them, which is still mostly unprotected, even in the event of damage that has already occurred! The EU must finally stop acting ‘at home’ and in the world at different standards, while, on the one hand, calling for respect for human rights and demanding respect for human rights elsewhere and, on the other hand, from violating human rights, in particular health, on the other hand. I do not find this image of the EU acceptable and sorry for it! Finally, they change this state so that there are no reports of terrible effects of UNSER chemicals in other parts of the world! Don't always stick to the industry’s threat of jobs here! Large corporations will find other, more environmentally and human-friendly substances if they are forced to search for them at all. And our people too must finally understand that we are also responsible for the rest of the world, which we have so far dealt with in such a delicate way and that this will also have an impact on our own wealth. Show the backbone! We rely on SIE! Thank you very much, Charlotte Rist.

feedback: Esportare nei paesi extracomunitari i pesticidi tossici proibiti in Europa è vergognoso e viola il diritto internazionale . Bisogna assolutamente vietare lesportazione di pesticidi e altre sostanze tossiche già proibite in Europa! Grazie.
englishfeedback: Exporting to non-EU countries toxic pesticides banned in Europe is shameful and violates international law. The export of pesticides and other toxic substances already banned in Europe must be banned! Thanks.

feedback: Buongiorno,esiste un solo pianeta Terra. Vietare veleni solo in una parte di esso e consentirgli in altre parti,non risolve il problema,visto che i prodotti della Terra vengono esportati ovunque. Cose risapute,certo....Il mistero è perché continuano a succedere?????
englishfeedback: Buongiorno, there is only one planet Earth. Banning poison only in one part of it and allowing it in other parts does not solve the problem, as Earth’s products are exported everywhere. What happened, certainly.... The mystery is why they continue to happen?

feedback: hallo, ist moralisch ein unding, diese chemikalien, die in der eu verboten sind, noch ins nicht-eu-gebiet zu exportieren. sind selber keinen deut besser als diktaturen etc., weil die industrielobby in der eu scheinbar das sagen hat, sonst wäre es nicht möglich, dass es diese exporte noch immer gibt...aber ich habe vertrauen, dass sie ihre arbeit machen und diese praktiken stoppen. lg aus brandenburg. torsten.
englishfeedback: Hallo, morally, is a failure to export these chemicals, which are banned in the EU, to the non-EU territory. They are not themselves better than dictatorships, etc. because the industrial lobby in the EU seems to have said so, otherwise it would not be possible that these exports still exist...but I trust that they are working and stop these practices.

feedback: It is completely illogical to ban chemicals as dangerous in the EU, export them to other countries and reimport products containing those chemicals. We live in an interdependent circulatory system and ignore that fact at out peril. Have we already forgotten the lessons of the DDT issue?

Sostanze dannose e pericolose in Europa sono dannose e pericolose anche in qualsiasi altro Paese del mondo. L'Unione Europea deve allineare la sua politica interna con quella estera, anche e soprattutto in materia di sicurezza alimentare e tutela degli ecosistemi, vietando le esportazioni di ciò che non è disposta ad importare ed utilizzare entro i suoi confini.
englishfeedback: Harmful and hazardous substances in Europe are also harmful and dangerous in any other country of the world. The European Union must align its internal policy with its foreign policy, including and above all on food security and the protection of ecosystems, by prohibiting exports of what it is not prepared to import and use within its borders.

feedback: Mir fehlt jegliches Verständnis dafür, dass Pestizide, die in der EU verboten sind, weiter produziert und exportiert werden dürfen. Ihr Einsatz hat katastrophale Folgen für die Umwelt und die Menschen in den Regionen in denen sie eingesetzt werden. Es gibt nur eine Konsequenz, sie gehören ausnahmslos verboten.
englishfeedback: I do not understand that pesticides banned in the EU can continue to be produced and exported. Their deployment has disastrous consequences for the environment and people in the regions where they are deployed. There is only one consequence: they are prohibited without exception.

feedback: Vendere e favorire l'esportazione di prodotti chimici nocivi rappresenta un delitto contro l'umanità intera e se ancora oggi si tentenna basti pensare ai prodotti di ritorno elaborati nei Paesi importatori e rivenduti in Europa e nel resto del mondo. Il paradosso della nostra odierna società è rappresentato da migliaia di persone che muoiono di fame e di altrettante migliaia di persone perennemente in dieta o obesi perché mangiano più di quanto conviene alla salute. Lavoriamo e prodighiamoci per salvarci tutti insieme o, alla fine, periremo tutti insieme, compreso i pro pesticidi.
englishfeedback: Selling and promoting the export of harmful chemicals is a crime against humanity as a whole, and if we still look at returning products produced in importing countries and resold in Europe and the rest of the world. The paradox of today’s society is represented by thousands of people who die of hunger and thousands of people who are permanently in diet or obese because they eat more than they eat to health. We work and try to save everyone together or, in the end, all together, including pro pesticides.

feedback: Bisogna essere coerenti. Il mondo è uno e ciò che facciamo in un luogo si riverbera in un altro. Ciò che vogliamo per noi lo dobbiamo garantire anche negli altri Paesi.
englishfeedback: We need to be coherent. The world is one and what we do in one place comes back to another. What we want to do for us must be guaranteed in other countries as well.

feedback: Guten Tag, bitte lesen Sie angehängten Artikel, falls er Ihnen nicht schon zur Verfügung steht. So wichtig wie für unsere Gesundheit das Mikrobiom ist, so wichtig ist dieses für das Überleben der Erde. Pestiziede zerstören das Mikrobiom (den Humus) der Erde nachhaltig, so wie das Antibiotika das Mikrobiom im Darm. Humus speichert CO2, macht Biodervisität wieder möglich etc etc... Pestizieder zerstören die Erde nachhaltig. Bitte setzen Sie sich dafür ein, dass Pestiziede aus der Landwirdschaft verschwinden, damit noch viele Generationen auf diesem Planetenlebenswert leben können. Mit freundlichen bittenden Grüßen Susanne Rivoir
englishfeedback: Dear, please read the attached articles if you do not already have it at your disposal. As important for our health, microbiome is as important for the survival of the planet. Pesticides destroy the soil’s microbiome (humus) sustainably, as does the antibiotic the microbiome in the gut. Humus stores CO2, restores biodevisibility, etc. Pesticides are destroying the Earth in a sustainable way. Please encourage the disappearance of pesticides from rural development, so that many generations can still live on this planetary life. Yours sincerely, Susanne Rivoir

feedback: Je ne suis pas d'accord avec l'exportation de pesticides classés comme toxiques et interdits en europe vers des pays tiers. Si les risques sur la santé publique est avéré ou considéré comme tel dans l'UE il est immoral et incompréhensible que nous nous autirisions à les exporter, même si les pays tiers en font la demande. Au delà du risque sanitaire dans les pays concernés, il se pose aussi la question environnementale qui dépasse largement les frontières : impact sur les écosystèmes. Le courage de prendre la décision de ne plus exporter ces produits forcerait également l'obligation dinnover, serait valeur d'exemple et en accord avec les valeurs que nous défendons, et serait l'opportunité pour l'UE d'être leader dans les solutions alternatives, et générerait à moyen terme de l'emploi.
englishfeedback: I disagree with the export of pesticides classified as toxic and banned in Europe to third countries. If risks to public health are known or considered to be public health risks in the EU, it is immoral and incomprehensible that we would afford to export them, even if third countries so request. In addition to the health risk in the countries concerned, the environmental issue, which goes far beyond borders, also arises: impact on ecosystems. The courage to take the decision not to export these products would also force the obligation to innovate, would be a good example and in line with the values we stand for, and would be the opportunity for the EU to be a leader in alternative solutions, and would generate employment in the medium term.

feedback: Ritengo che proibire l'esportazione, al di fuori dell'UE, di sostanze nocive per la salute non realizzi solo il rispetto dei diritti umani di altri popoli ma salvaguardi la salute degli stessi popoli europei. Noi importiamo cibo da paesi extra-UE, viaggiamo e lavoriamo in paesi extra-UE. Le condizioni di salubrità di qualunque luogo nel mondo ci riguardano. Inoltre la reputazione dell'UE come formazione politica che agisce nel rispetto dei diritti umani e nella salvaguardia della natura, facendo ogni sforzo per mitigare i danni già spesso irreversibili provocati anche dall'uso di sostanze inquinanti, tale reputazione mi interessa molto. Leila Lisa Maria d'Angelo, Pisa, Italia
englishfeedback: I believe that banning the export of substances harmful to health outside the EU not only achieves respect for the human rights of other peoples but also safeguards the health of the peoples of Europe themselves. We import food from outside the EU, travel and work in non-EU countries. The health conditions of any place in the world are of concern to us. In addition, the EU’s reputation as a political formation acting in accordance with human rights and nature conservation, making every effort to mitigate the already often irreversible damage also caused by the use of pollutants, is of great interest to me. Leila Lisa Maria d’Angelo, Pisa, Italy

feedback: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Chemikalien zerstören die gesamte Natur. In Afrika weiter zerstören und sich über die Naturgesetze hinwegsetzen, statt Nahrung in natürlicher und angemessener Form zu ermöglichen, macht keinen Sinn! In allen Entscheidungen sind alle Auswirkungen auf den gesamten Planeten zu berücksichtigen. Einen weiteren Kontinent mit Chemikalien zum eigenen Profit zu vergiften hilft keinem auf Dauer. Die moderne Form des Kolonialismus muss aufhören. Mit freundlichen Grüßen aus Düsseldorf David Fischer
englishfeedback: Ladies and gentlemen, chemicals destroy all nature. In Africa, it makes no sense to further destroy and overrule nature laws, rather than providing food in a natural and appropriate form. All impacts on the planet should be taken into account in all decisions. Poisoning another continent with chemicals for its own profit is no longer useful. The modern form of colonialism must stop. Best regards from Düsseldorf David Fischer

feedback: La exportación de plaguicidas tóxicos beneficia a los países en que la reglamentación es menos estricta. La UE tiene un papel que desempeñar en el mundo - no se debe permitir que sus empresas se beneficien de los países con menor regulación. ¿Cómo podemos ser tomados en serio si enviamos nuestros productos químicos peligrosos al extranjero, envenenando así a las poblaciones y a la naturaleza en países donde las normas de seguridad son más débiles y menos rigurosas?
englishfeedback: Exports of toxic pesticides benefit countries where regulation is less stringent. The EU has a role to play in the world – its companies should not be allowed to benefit from less regulated countries. How can we be taken seriously if we send our dangerous chemicals abroad, poisoning populations and nature in countries where safety standards are weaker and lower?

feedback: Bitte wirken Sie mit allen Kräften darauf hin, dass Chemikalien, die in der Europäischen Union verboten sind, auch für den Export verboten werden. In Zeiten der Globalisierung richten diese Gifte nicht nur in den Zielregionen ihr gesundheits- und naturzerstörerisches Werk an, sie kommen mit den Wirtschaftskreisläufen auch zu uns zurück. Siehe dazu u.a. https://umweltinstitut.org/landwirtschaft/meldungen/export-verbotener-pestizide-soll-eingeschraenkt-werden/
englishfeedback: Please make every effort to ensure that chemicals banned in the European Union are also banned for export. In times of globalisation, these poisons do not only target their health and nature destruction in the target regions, but they also come back to us with the economic cycles. See, for example, https://umweltinstitut.org/landwirtschaft/meldungen/export-verbotener-pestizide-soll-eingeschraenkt-werden/

feedback: L'exportation de pesticides toxiques est une question de respect absolu des droits humains, car ces pesticides sont nocifs pour notre santé : chaque année, des milliers d'agriculteurs meurent des suites dune trop forte exposition à ces pesticides dangereux. Les pesticides exportés font l'objet d'innombrables études qui confirment leurs effets néfastes sur les humains, la biodiversité, la végétation, ils empoisonnent et stérilisent les terres agricoles. STOP À LA PRODUCTION DES PESTICIDES DE SYNTHÈSE, OÙ QUE CE SOIT SUR LA PLANÈTE !
englishfeedback: The export of toxic pesticides is a matter of full respect for human rights, as these pesticides are harmful to our health: every year, thousands of farmers die as a result of excessive exposure to these hazardous pesticides. Exported pesticides are the subject of countless studies confirming their adverse effects on humans, biodiversity, vegetation, poisoning and sterilising farmland. STOP THE PRODUCTION OF SYNTHETIC PESTICIDES ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD!

feedback: Chiedo alla Commissione Europea di vietare l'esportazione di pesticidi tossici verso quelle aree del mondo dove ancora non è vigente una legislazione che ne proibisce l'uso. Grazie Sergio Peano, DVM
englishfeedback: I call on the European Commission to ban the export of toxic pesticides to those parts of the world where there is still no legislation prohibiting their use. Thank you Sergio Peano, DVM

feedback: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, bitte schützen Sie die Gesundheit aller Menschen auf diesem Planeten und die Umwelt, die uns ernährt. Stimmen Sie für ein Verbot dieser Chemikalien, die uns langfristig nur schaden! Mit freundlichen Grüßen Verena Hohenester (Biologielaborantin)
englishfeedback: Ladies and Gentlemen, please protect the health of all people on this planet and the environment that feeds us. Vote in favour of banning these chemicals, which will only harm us in the long term! Yours sincerely, Verena Hohenester (Biology Laboratory)

feedback: Les méfaits générés par ces produits sont UNIVERSELS : les personnes et insectes non-européens seront autant impactés que nous : problèmes de reproduction, maladies neurodégénératives, ainsi que mort des abeilles ! L'UE doit montrer l'exemple et ses entreprises ne devraient pas être autorisées à profiter des pays où la réglementation est plus faible. L'Europe et le monde doivent évoluer vers des méthodes de protection des plantes plus durables. Ce devrait aussi être repris et exigé dans de futurs accords type Mercosur !
englishfeedback: The harm generated by these products is UNIVERSELS: non-European people and insects will be as affected as we: reproductive problems, neurodegenerative diseases and bee deaths! The EU must lead by example and its companies should not be allowed to benefit from countries with weaker regulation. Europe and the world need to move towards more sustainable plant protection methods. This should also be included and demanded in future Mercosur agreements!

feedback: Il faut interdire la production à des fins dexportation de produits chimiques interdits dans lUnion européenne. Toute autre approche serait incohérente.
englishfeedback: The production for export of chemicals banned in the EU should be prohibited. Any other approach would be inconsistent.

feedback: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, es sollte mittlerweile allen klar sein, das Chemikalien die gesamte Natur zerstören. Warum in Afrika weiter zerstören und sich über die Naturgesetze hinwegzusetzen, als der Menschheit Nahrung zu ermöglichen in natürlicher und angemessener Form. In allen Entscheidungen sind alle Auswirkungen auf 7 Generationen zu berücksichtigen. Einen weiteren Kontinent mit Chemikalien zum eigenen Profit zu vergiften hilft keinem auf Dauer. Die moderne Form des Kolonialismus muss aufhören. Mit freundlichen Grüßen.
englishfeedback: Ladies and Gentlemen, it should now be clear to everyone that chemicals destroy all nature. Why in Africa further destroy and break nature laws than providing humanity with food in a natural and appropriate form. All the impacts on 7 generations should be taken into account in all decisions. Poisoning another continent with chemicals for its own profit is no longer useful. The modern form of colonialism must stop. Yours Sincerely,

feedback: Les abeilles sont indispensables à l'équilibre biologique de la planète et à celui de l'espèce humaine. Je souhaite que tous les produits qui peuvent faire du mal aux abeilles soient totalement interdits en Europe et dans le monde. Merci de nous permettre de donner notre avis et s'il vous plaît faites ce qui convient mieux à l'ensemble de l'humanité. Respectueusement
englishfeedback: Bees are essential for the biological balance of the planet and of the human species. I want all products that can cause harm to bees to be banned completely in Europe and worldwide. Thank you for allowing us to give our opinion and if you like to do what is better for humanity as a whole. Honourfully

feedback: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, bitte stimmen Sie für das Verbot der Herstellung und Ausfuhr gefährlicher Chemikalien: Ihre Gesundheit ist Ihr wichtigstes Gut - schützen Sie die Gesundheit unserer Mitmenschen - auch in anderen Ländern. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Prof. Dr. Michael Meyer
englishfeedback: Ladies and Gentlemen, please vote in favour of the ban on the production and export of dangerous chemicals: Your health is your most important good – protecting the health of our fellow people – also in other countries. Yours sincerely, Prof. Michael Meyer

feedback: Dieses Verbot ist überfällig und sollte schnellstmöglich erlassen werden. Giftige Substanzen sind überall auf der Welt giftig und schädigen Menschen, Tiere, Pflanzen, die Umwelt im allgemeinen und damit den Planeten, auf dem auch wir leben. Sorgen der Industrie bzgl. Verlust von Arbeitsplätzen und Wirtschaftsleistung sind unbegründet, da durch ein Verbot in aller Regel Forschung und Fortschritt hin zu unschädlichen Alternativen ermöglicht wird oder diese günstiger werden. Da Alternativen für den Einsatz innerhalb der EU überwiegend bereits verfügbar sind, sind auch keine langen Übergangsfristen erforderlich. Es wäre wünschenswert, europäischen Unternehmen die Herstellung verbotener Chemikalien auch weltweit zu untersagen, soweit das juristisch zumindest mittelbar möglich ist.
englishfeedback: This ban is overdue and should be adopted as soon as possible. Toxic substances are toxic everywhere in the world and harm people, animals, plants, the environment in general, and thus the planet we live on. Industry’s concerns about: Job losses and economic performance are unjustified, as a ban usually allows research and progress towards harmless alternatives or makes them cheaper. As alternatives for use within the EU are mostly already available, there is no need for long transition periods either. It would be desirable to prohibit European companies from producing banned chemicals worldwide, provided that this is legally possible, at least indirectly.

feedback: Ich bin alsolut für das Verbot der Herstellung und Ausfuhr von Chemikalien, die in der Europäischen Union verboten sind. Werte, Normen und Umweltschutz dürfen uns nicht nur in Europa wichtig sein, sondern wir müssen über unseren Tellerrand hinweg schauen und dafür sorgen, dass durch unser Handeln kein Schaden - egal wo auf der Welt, entsteht.
englishfeedback: I am therefore in favour of banning the production and export of chemicals that are banned in the European Union. Values, standards and environmental protection must not only be important in Europe, but we need to look beyond our edges and ensure that our actions do not cause harm, wherever in the world.

feedback: Bitte tun Sie alles, um den Einsatz und die Verbreitung aller nicht für die Umwelt zuträglichen oder zumindest ungefährlichen Stoffe zu unterbinden. Danke.
englishfeedback: Please do everything possible to prevent the use and distribution of all substances not beneficial to the environment or at least non-hazardous. Thanks.

feedback: Wir wissen, dass es biologisch gesehen keine Grenzen gibt und die Funktionlität aller Ökosysteme unserer Biosphäre zusammenhängt. Eindringlich wird uns dies auch durch die Klimakatastrophe gezeigt. In Europa verbotene Substanzen verbreiten und zerstören somit nicht nur die Lebensgrundlage von Ökosysteme in Exportländern, sondern die Ökosphäre an sich und schädigen somit auch uns in Europa. Für ein Überleben in dem von uns geschaffenen Anthopozän ist notwendig die Ressourcen unseres Planeten zu schonen und selbstzuerhalten, ein Ausfuhrvebot von in Europa verbotenen Pestiziden muss somit selbstverständlich sein.
englishfeedback: We know that there are no limits from a biological point of view and that the functionality of all ecosystems in our biosphere is linked. This is also strongly demonstrated by the climate catastrophe. Thus, substances banned in Europe do not only spread and destroy the livelihoods of ecosystems in exporting countries, but also the ecosphere itself and thus harm us in Europe too. In order to survive in the anthopocene we created, it is necessary to preserve and maintain our planet’s resources, so an export ban on pesticides banned in Europe must be self-evident.

feedback: Il est urgent d'interdire les produits chimiques néfastes à la nature !
englishfeedback: There is an urgent need to ban chemicals that are harmful to nature!

feedback: L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è dannosa per le api, la biodiversità e il pianeta. Le prove sono chiare: i neonicotinoidi e altri pesticidi velenosi uccidono le api. Ecco perché sono vietati in Europa. Perché continuiamo a permettere che vengano esportati in Paesi uccidendo le api e decimando la biodiversità?
englishfeedback: The export of toxic pesticides is detrimental to bees, biodiversity and the planet. The evidence is clear: neonicotinoids and other poisonous pesticides kill bees. This is why they are banned in Europe. Why do we continue to allow them to be exported to countries by killing bees and deciding on biodiversity?

feedback: Wenn Pestizide und andere Chemikalien aus guten Gründen bei uns in der EU verboten sind, wie können wir dann die Produktion und Ausfuhr in andere Länder erlauben, in denen diese aufgrund dort herrschender Landesgesetze noch nicht verboten sind? Das ist moralisch und ethisch absolut verwerflich: Die Mittel sind zwar giftig, gesundheitsschädlich für Mensch und Tier, aber in anderen Ländern können Mensch und Tier gerne daran Schaden nehmen? Das geht nicht! Bitte stoppen Sie die Produktion und den Export von gefährlichen Chemikalien in Länder außerhalb der Europäischen Union. Helfen Sie mit, diese Welt zu einer besseren Welt zu machen! Und sorgen Sie gleichzeitig dafür, dass Waren, die mit diesen gefährlichen Chemikalien behandelt wurden, in die EU eingeführt werden dürfen. Damit trocknen Sie die Nachfrage und den Markt für die Chemikalien nachhaltig aus. Freundliche Grüße Eckhard Bogner Dipl.Inf.
englishfeedback: If pesticides and other chemicals are banned in the EU for good reasons, how can we allow production and export to other countries where they are not yet banned on the basis of provincial laws in force there? This is morally and ethically reprehensible: The products are toxic, harmful to humans and animals, but in other countries can humans and animals like this? That is not acceptable! Please stop the production and export of hazardous chemicals to countries outside the European Union. Help make this world a better world! And at the same time make sure that goods treated with these hazardous chemicals can be imported into the EU. By doing so, dry the demand and market for chemicals in a sustainable way. Yours sincerely, Eckhard Bogner Dipl.Inf.

feedback: Bitte stoppen Sie die Ausfuhr gefährlicher Chemikalien! Nicht alle, aber viele der gefährlichen Pestizide sind in Europa verboten. Selbst die hier rechtlich verbotenen Stoffe werden aber immer noch nach Afrika und Südamerika exportiert. Die EU könnte dem mit einem Exportverbot endlich ein Ende bereiten und der Industrie damit klar machen, dass wir neue, nachhaltige Lösungen zur Gesunderhaltung unserer globalen Böden brauchen. Nicht nur unsere Umwelt geht an den nach wie vor für den Export zugelassenen Pestiziden zu Grunde, wir ziehen uns damit selbst den Boden unter den Füßen weg, da Biodiversitätsverlust, Nährstoffarmut und Schadstoffbelastungen im Substrat auf dem unsere Lebensmittel wachsen sollen zu Ernteminderrungen und schlussendlich komplettem Ausfall führen werden. Wenn Sie möchten, dass sich Ihre Enkelkinder ernähren können, kümmern Sie sich bitte um die Erhaltung unserer aller Lebensgrundlagen und nicht die kurzfristigen Profite der Industrie!
englishfeedback: Please stop the export of dangerous chemicals! Not all but many of the hazardous pesticides are banned in Europe. However, even the substances legally banned here are still exported to Africa and South America. The EU could finally put an end to this with an export ban, making it clear to industry that we need new, sustainable solutions to keep our global soils healthy. Not only is our environment based on the pesticides that are still approved for export, but we are moving ourselves away from our feet, as biodiversity loss, nutrient poverty and pollution in the substrate on which our food is expected to grow will reduce harvests and ultimately lead to complete failure. If you want your grandchildren to be able to feed, please take care to preserve all our livelihoods and not the short-term profits of industry!

feedback: Verbieten Sie endlich den Export von gefährlichen Chemikalien zum Schutz unseres Planeten und aller Menschen ! Ich kann nicht glauben dass es noch immer erlaubt ist bei uns schon verbotene Umweltgifte weiter zu exportieren
englishfeedback: Finally, ban the export of hazardous chemicals to protect our planet and all people! I cannot believe that we are still allowed to continue exporting already banned environmental poisons

feedback: Dobbiamo vietare l'esportazione di pesticidi tossici! Ecco alcuni motivi per cui abbiamo bisogno di un divieto sulle esportazione: L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici mette in luce un doppio standard: I pesticidi pericolosi sono stati vietati in Europa dopo essere stati collegati a cancro, problemi riproduttivi e malattie neurodegenerative, nonché alla morte delle api. Alcuni di questi pesticidi sono vietati in Europa perché collegati a danni cerebrali nei bambini e nei neonati. Se questi pesticidi sono troppo pericolosi per noi, come possiamo che vengano esportati allestero? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è una questione di diritti umani, poiché questi pesticidi tossici danneggiano le persone: Ogni anno, migliaia di agricoltori muoiono per l'esposizione di pesticidi pericolosi. Esistono innumerevoli studi che dimostrano gli effetti dannosi sulle persone dei pesticidi esportati. L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è dannosa per le api, la biodiversità e il pianeta. Le prove sono chiare: i neonicotinoidi e altri pesticidi velenosi uccidono le api. Ecco perché sono vietati in Europa. Perché continuiamo a permettere che vengano esportati in Paesi uccidendo le api e decimando la biodiversità? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici sfrutta i paesi con leggi più permissive. L'Europa ha un ruolo da svolgere nel mondo: non si deve permettere alle sue aziende di approfittare dei paesi con una regolamentazione più debole. Come possiamo essere presi sul serio se spediamo le nostre sostanze chimiche pericolose all'estero, avvelenando le persone e la natura in paesi dove le norme di sicurezza sono più deboli e meno rigorose? Un divieto di esportazione dei pesticidi tossici sarebbe un vantaggio per l'innovazione e aiuterebbe l'Europa e il mondo intero verso pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Mantenere sul mercato pesticidi vecchi e pericolosi ci priva di un futuro più verde e di pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Un parere legale del Centro di diritto ambientale internazional (Center for International Environmental Law), pubblicato nel 2022, dimostra che le esportazioni dell'UE di pesticidi vietati verso l'Africa e l'America centrale violano gli obblighi legali internazionali dell'UE e i diritti umani. Distinti saluti, Alessandro Guido
englishfeedback: We need to ban the export of toxic pesticides! Here are some reasons why we need an export ban: The export of toxic pesticides highlights a double standard: Hazardous pesticides have been banned in Europe after being linked to cancer, reproductive problems and neurodegenerative diseases, as well as to the death of bees. Some of these pesticides are banned in Europe because they are linked to brain damage in children and infants. If these pesticides are too dangerous for us, how can they be exported abroad? The export of toxic pesticides is a human rights issue, as these toxic pesticides harm people: Every year, thousands of farmers die from exposure of hazardous pesticides. There are countless studies demonstrating the harmful effects of exported pesticides on people. The export of toxic pesticides is detrimental to bees, biodiversity and the planet. The evidence is clear: neonicotinoids and other poisonous pesticides kill bees. This is why they are banned in Europe. Why do we continue to allow them to be exported to countries by killing bees and deciding on biodiversity? The export of toxic pesticides exploits countries with more permissive laws. Europe has a role to play in the world: its companies should not be allowed to take advantage of countries with weaker regulation. How can we be taken seriously if we ship our hazardous chemicals abroad, poisoning people and nature in countries where safety standards are weaker and lower? A ban on the export of toxic pesticides would benefit innovation and help Europe and the world towards more sustainable farming practices. Keeping old and hazardous pesticides on the market deprives us of a greener future and more sustainable farming practices. A legal opinion of the Center for International Environmental Law, published in 2022, shows that EU exports of banned pesticides to Africa and Central America violate the EU’s international legal obligations and human rights. Yours sincerely, Alessandro Guido

feedback: I veleni sono veleni ovunque. I veleni rilasciati nel pianeta circolano ovunque nel pianeta. L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici mette in luce un doppio standard: I pesticidi pericolosi sono stati vietati in Europa dopo essere stati collegati a cancro, problemi riproduttivi e malattie neurodegenerative, nonché alla morte delle api. Alcuni di questi pesticidi sono vietati in Europa perché collegati a danni cerebrali nei bambini e nei neonati. Se questi pesticidi sono troppo pericolosi per noi, come possiamo che vengano esportati allestero? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è una questione di diritti umani, poiché questi pesticidi tossici danneggiano le persone: Ogni anno, migliaia di agricoltori muoiono per l'esposizione di pesticidi pericolosi. Esistono innumerevoli studi che dimostrano gli effetti dannosi sulle persone dei pesticidi esportati. L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è dannosa per le api, la biodiversità e il pianeta. Le prove sono chiare: i neonicotinoidi e altri pesticidi velenosi uccidono le api. Ecco perché sono vietati in Europa. Perché continuiamo a permettere che vengano esportati in Paesi uccidendo le api e decimando la biodiversità? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici sfrutta i paesi con leggi più permissive. L'Europa ha un ruolo da svolgere nel mondo: non si deve permettere alle sue aziende di approfittare dei paesi con una regolamentazione più debole. Come possiamo essere presi sul serio se spediamo le nostre sostanze chimiche pericolose all'estero, avvelenando le persone e la natura in paesi dove le norme di sicurezza sono più deboli e meno rigorose? Un divieto di esportazione dei pesticidi tossici sarebbe un vantaggio per l'innovazione e aiuterebbe l'Europa e il mondo intero verso pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Mantenere sul mercato pesticidi vecchi e pericolosi ci priva di un futuro più verde e di pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Un parere legale del Centro di diritto ambientale internazional (Center for International Environmental Law), pubblicato nel 2022, dimostra che le esportazioni dell'UE di pesticidi vietati verso l'Africa e l'America centrale violano gli obblighi legali internazionali dell'UE e i diritti umani.
englishfeedback: Poison is poison everywhere. Poison released to the planet circulates everywhere in the planet. The export of toxic pesticides highlights a double standard: Hazardous pesticides have been banned in Europe after being linked to cancer, reproductive problems and neurodegenerative diseases, as well as to the death of bees. Some of these pesticides are banned in Europe because they are linked to brain damage in children and infants. If these pesticides are too dangerous for us, how can they be exported abroad? The export of toxic pesticides is a human rights issue, as these toxic pesticides harm people: Every year, thousands of farmers die from exposure of hazardous pesticides. There are countless studies demonstrating the harmful effects of exported pesticides on people. The export of toxic pesticides is detrimental to bees, biodiversity and the planet. The evidence is clear: neonicotinoids and other poisonous pesticides kill bees. This is why they are banned in Europe. Why do we continue to allow them to be exported to countries by killing bees and deciding on biodiversity? The export of toxic pesticides exploits countries with more permissive laws. Europe has a role to play in the world: its companies should not be allowed to take advantage of countries with weaker regulation. How can we be taken seriously if we ship our hazardous chemicals abroad, poisoning people and nature in countries where safety standards are weaker and lower? A ban on the export of toxic pesticides would benefit innovation and help Europe and the world towards more sustainable farming practices. Keeping old and hazardous pesticides on the market deprives us of a greener future and more sustainable farming practices. A legal opinion of the Center for International Environmental Law, published in 2022, shows that EU exports of banned pesticides to Africa and Central America violate the EU’s international legal obligations and human rights.

feedback: Aus guten Gründen sind manche Chemikalien bei uns verboten. Bitte stoppen Sie auch deren Herstellung und Export - das ist ein moralisches und ökologisches Gebot! Freundliche Grüße, Dipl. Ing. Werner Gamerith
englishfeedback: For good reasons, some chemicals are banned from us. Please also stop their production and export – this is a moral and ecological imperative! Yours sincerely, Dipl. Werner Gamerith

feedback: Confido nella saggezza della Commissione che si occupa dei temi ambientali affinché sostenga la decisione di bloccare l'invio di pesticidi e altre sostanze nocive per uomo e ambiente nei paesi extra-UE Ringrazio per l'attenzione Tiziana Bellelli
englishfeedback: I trust the Commission’s wisdom on environmental issues to support the decision to stop the dispatch of pesticides and other substances harmful to humans and the environment to non-EU countries Ringrzio for the attention of Tiziana Bellelli

feedback: L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è dannosa per le api, la biodiversità e il pianeta. Le prove sono chiare: i neonicotinoidi e altri pesticidi velenosi uccidono le api. Ecco perché sono vietati in Europa. Perché continuiamo a permettere che vengano esportati in Paesi uccidendo le api e decimando la biodiversità? Ma soprattutto perché continuare ad usare queste sostanze dannose? Per il profitto di chi? Una Volta un grande uomo disse che "Ciò che è dato è reso", io mi auguro e spero che mantenga la parola con chi non ama il suo prossimo. Saluti Roberta
englishfeedback: The export of toxic pesticides is detrimental to bees, biodiversity and the planet. The evidence is clear: neonicotinoids and other poisonous pesticides kill bees. This is why they are banned in Europe. Why do we continue to allow them to be exported to countries by killing bees and deciding on biodiversity? But above all why continue to use these harmful substances? For the profit of whom? A great man said that ‘what is given is made’, I hope and hope that I will keep the word with those who do not love his next. Yours sincerely, Roberta

feedback: Die Ausfuhr giftiger Pestizide ist desaströs für Bienen, die biologische Vielfalt und den Planeten. Die Beweislage ist eindeutig: Neonics und andere giftige Pestizide töten Bienen. Deshalb sind sie in Europa verboten. Wir sollten nicht zulassen, dass diese Pestizide in Länder exportiert werden, in denen Gesundheitsvorschriften weniger streng sind und dort Bienen und die biologische Vielfalt zerstören. Ein Exportverbot für giftige Pestizide würde Europa und der Welt helfen, zu nachhaltigeren Pflanzenschutzmethoden überzugehen. Wenn gefährliche Pestizide auf dem Markt bleiben, werden wir weiter auf eine grünere Zukunft und nachhaltige Landwirtschaft warten müssen.
englishfeedback: Exports of toxic pesticides are desastrous for bees, biodiversity and the planet. The evidence is clear: Neonics and other toxic pesticides kill bees. This is why they are banned in Europe. We should not allow these pesticides to be exported to countries where health rules are less stringent and where bees and biodiversity are destroyed. A ban on exports of toxic pesticides would help Europe and the world move towards more sustainable plant protection practices. If hazardous pesticides remain on the market, we will have to wait for a greener future and sustainable agriculture.

feedback: Hallo, ich bin absolut DAFÜR dass wir für jegliche Ausfuhr genau dieselben Maßstäbe anwenden wie für den EU Binnenraum. Herstellung und Ausfuhr von Chemikalien, die in der Europäischen Union verboten sind müssen daher generell verboten werden. Freundliche Grüße Dieter Siebeck
englishfeedback: Hello, I am absolutely DEFTER that we apply exactly the same standards for any export as for the EU’s internal area. The production and export of chemicals banned in the European Union must therefore be banned in general. Best regards, Dieter Siebeck

feedback: Perché esportare pesticidi che sono vietati in Europa? Dovete vietare l'esportazione di pesticidi/morte nei confronti di esseri umani ed insetti impollinatori! Non si vive solo di profitto economico a discapito di salute e ambiente,che sia fuori o dentro l'Europa. Grazie
englishfeedback: Why export pesticides that are banned in Europe? You need to ban the export of pesticides/death against humans and pollinating insects! There is not just an economic gain at the expense of health and the environment, whether outside or inside Europe. Thanks

feedback: Es ist ein Unding, Pestizide, die in der EU aus gutem Grund (Gefährlichkeit für Mensch und Umwelt) verboten sind, in andere Länder zu exportieren - dort sind sie genauso schädlich ! Ein verbotenes Mittel darf nicht exportiert werden! Exportieren wir unsere Kenntnisse, und exportieren wir moderne, unschädliche Mittel. Alles andere ist Betrug, der letztlich auf uns selber zurückfällt, spätestens wenn die Umwelt in den Exportländern zerstört ist und wir die Klimakrise ernten.
englishfeedback: It is a business case to export pesticides that are banned in the EU for good reason (hazard to humans and the environment) to other countries, where they are equally harmful! A prohibited product must not be exported! We export our knowledge and export modern, harmless means. Everything else is fraud, which ultimately goes back to ourselves, at the latest when the environment in exporting countries is destroyed and when we reap the climate crisis.

feedback: Come cittadina europea esprimo la mia contrarietà all'invio di pesticidi letali nei paesi del mondo. Basta inquinare, basta sterminio delle api.
englishfeedback: As a European citizen, I express my opposition to sending lethal pesticides to countries around the world. It is enough to pollute, just extermination of the bees.

feedback: Verbieten Sie den Export von gefährlichen Chemikalien für den Gewinn von riesen Konzernen aber ein Tod für unser Planeten und die Menschen die dort leben und arbeiten! Ich kann nicht glauben dass es überhaupt immer noch erlaubt ist!!!
englishfeedback: Ban the export of dangerous chemicals for the profit of huge corporations, but let us die for our planet and for the people who live and work there! I cannot believe that it is still allowed at all!

feedback: L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è dannosa per le api, la biodiversità ed il pianeta. Le prove sono chiare: i neonicotinoidi e altri pesticidi velenosi uccidono le api. Ecco perché sono vietati in Europa. Perché continuiamo a permettere che vengano esportati in Paesi uccidendo le api e decimando la biodiversità? L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici mette in luce un doppio standard: I pesticidi pericolosi sono stati vietati in Europa dopo essere stati collegati a cancro, problemi riproduttivi e malattie neurodegenerative, nonché alla morte delle api. Alcuni di questi pesticidi sono vietati in Europa perché collegati a danni cerebrali nei bambini e nei neonati. L'esportazione di pesticidi tossici è una questione di diritti umani, poiché questi pesticidi tossici danneggiano le persone: Ogni anno, migliaia di agricoltori muoiono per l'esposizione di pesticidi pericolosi. L'Europa ha un ruolo da svolgere nel mondo: non si deve permettere alle sue aziende di approfittare dei paesi con una regolamentazione più debole. Come possiamo essere presi sul serio se spediamo le nostre sostanze chimiche pericolose all'estero, avvelenando le persone e la natura in paesi dove le norme di sicurezza sono più deboli e meno rigorose? Un divieto di esportazione dei pesticidi tossici sarebbe un vantaggio per l'innovazione e aiuterebbe l'Europa e il mondo intero verso pratiche agricole più sostenibili. Mantenere sul mercato pesticidi vecchi e pericolosi ci priva di un futuro più verde e di pratiche agricole più sostenibili.
